author: ESPNcricinfo staff
description: New Zealand, in familiar conditions overhead and underfoot, cruised past Bangladesh by four wickets in Clontarf to stay unbeaten in the tri-series
title: Bennett, Neesham lead New Zealand's canter

author: ESPNcricinfo staff
description: When the two teams meet on Wednesday, Bangladesh will have a chance to register their first victory over New Zealand at an away or a neutral venue
title: Bangladesh seek maiden away win against New Zealand

author: BBC Sport
description: Lions must be ready for "hardest weeks of rugby they will ever have faced" warns Gavin Hastings, captain on the 1993 New Zealand tour.
title: British and Irish Lions 2017: Gavin Hastings recalls 1993 New Zealand tour

author: ESPNcricinfo staff
description: The former New Zealand seamer says bowlers currently active in the IPL might have a hard time adjusting to longer workloads when the Champions Trophy comes around in June
title: Hard for bowlers to go from IPL to ODIs - Bond

author: NICK PERRY
description: WELLINGTON, New Zealand (AP) â€” When researchers traveled to a tiny, uninhabited island in the middle of the Pacific Ocean, they were astonished to find an estimated 38 million pieces of trash washed up on the beaches. Almost all of the garbage they found on Henderson Island was made from plastic. There were toy soldiers, dominos, toothbrushes and hundreds of hardhats of every shape, size and color. The researchers say the density of trash was the highest recorded anywhere in the world, despite Henderson Island's extreme remoteness. The island is located about halfway between New Zealand and Chile and is recognized as a UNESCO world heritage site.
title: Scientists find 38 million pieces of trash on Pacific island

description: Steve Hansen, the All Blacks head coach, is raising the pressure on the British and Irish Lions by questioning whether they will be able to deal with the expectation that will surround them on their tour of New Zealand, and has suggested that Warren Gatland, his opposite number, could struggle to maintain harmony within his squad once Test selections are made.
title: Exclusive interview -Steve Hansen: I doubt Lions can handle expectations
